org.digijava.kernel.persistence

Class InMemoryUserManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.digijava.kernel.persistence.InMemoryUserManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InMemoryManager<User>

    public class InMemoryUserManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements InMemoryManager<User>
    Non-persistent implementation of InMemoryManager which is backed by an in-memory map.

    Mainly intended for testing purposes, where a full blown persistent system isn't required.
